title: Roasted butternut squash and fennel soup
ingredients: ['1 large butternut squash - peeled, seeded and cubed', '1 bulb fresh fennel, white part only, cut into 1cm slices', '1 medium onion, cut into wedges', '4 cloves garlic, lightly crushed', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1L chicken stock', '75g marmalade', '1/2 teaspoon mixed spice', '120ml double cream', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste (optional)']
